subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After a dismal season last year in which Ford won only 7 Nextel Cup races to Chevrolet’s 26, Ford officials made a point last week to show their commitment to the newly named Sprint Cup.
snippet: After a dismal season last year in which Ford won only 7 Nextel Cup races to Chevrolet’s 26, Ford officials made a point last week to show their commitment to the newly named Sprint Cup.
